page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
{ {KEELAVITE LTD.HYDRAULICS.} Allesley. Design, manufacture & install fluid power systems.Their products will be found in many industries_ steel,mining,power generation(nuclear & conventional).
{Berkswell Forge,}still used as a blacksmiths.Half the work is industrial & a third agricultural repairs, the remainder of the work being tradition wrought ironwork including gates & fire-baskets.Mr Woolley,the blacksmith is an enthusiast for collecting old items. At the back of the workshop is part of a Second World War aircraft cockpit. Three other aircraft await restoration.
